colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES LHO BRAG DON GNYIS GLING GI GRVA RIGS DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG RNAM SNANG NAS 'JIGS BYED BCU GSUM MA'I DBANG GI RGYUD 'DEBS RDO RJE 'CHANG NAS RJE BTZUN RGYA MTSO MTHA' YAS DANG, NGOS PAR GYI BRGYUD RIM KHA SKONG ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, PAn CHEN CHOS RGYAN NAS, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES, DON YOD MKHAS GRUB PA, KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN, SGRUB KHANG GONG MA NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO, RDO RJE 'CHANG RGYA MTSO MTHA' YAS, DES BDAG LA STZAL BA YIN PAS DE'I BAR GYIS KHA BSKONG 'DI BZHIN RVA SGRENG AA CHI THU NO MON HAN GYIS SBYAR, ,)
